letters:
My Dearest [Daughter's Name],

I hope you can find it in your heart to forgive me. I am truly sorry for missing your dance recital. I can't express how devastated I am that I wasn’t there to see you shine on stage. Your hard work and dedication deserved to be celebrated, and I deeply regret not being present to cheer you on.

I know how much this performance meant to you, and I feel terrible for letting you down. Please understand that my absence was never a reflection of how much I care about you and your passions. I want to be there for you in every moment, especially during the ones that mean so much.

I promise to make it up to you. Let’s plan a special day together to celebrate your talent and all the effort you’ve put into your dance. You amaze me every day, and I want to ensure you know how proud I am of you.

Thank you for being such a wonderful daughter, and again, I’m so sorry for missing your special moment. I love you more than words can express.

With all my love,

[Your Name]
